content.rendered:
Directed by Mudassar Aziz

Written by Mudassar Aziz. Mudassar Aziz. B.R. Chopra. Ravi Kumar. Jasmeet K Reen. Jasmeet K Reen

Cast Kartik Aaryan (Abhinav ‘Chintu’ Tyagi). Bhumi Pednekar (Vedika Tripathi). Ananya Panday (Tapasya Singh (as Ananya Pandey)). Aparshakti Khurana (Fahim Rizvi). Rajesh Sharma (Prem Tripathi). Geeta Agrawal Sharma (Hemlata Tripathi). K.K. Raina (Arvind Tyagi). Navni Parihar (Kusum Tyagi). Neeraj Sood (Brijesh Pandey). Manu Rishi Chadha (Mukhtar Singh). Ankita Goraya (Aditi). Shubham Kumar (Rakes Yadav). Sunny Singh (Doga (as Sunny Singh Nijjar)). Kriti Sanon (Neha Khanna) . Harsh Abbasi (Raymond Salesman- Mega Mall). Joy Badlani (Yamir). Durgesh Chauhan (Shambhu). Gaurav (Rakesh Yadav’s Friend 2). Digvijay Singh Gurbat (Waiter (Lunch / Dinner) (as Digvijay Singh)). Gyaneshwar.(Constable Being Slapped). Nizam Hussain (Laurel). Mohammad Zafrul Khan (Radheshyam Peon). Nishant Khanduja (Tapasya’s Ex-Boyfriend). Prabhat Kumar (Hardy). Ashok Lal (Salesman- -Rajratan). Naitik (Kid At Swimming Pool). Keshav Pandit (Coaching Class Director). Vikas Rai (Young Man With Brijesh Pandey). Ravi (Rakesh Yadav’s Friend 1). Mamta Saxena (Brijesh Pandey’s Wife). Ritu Sharma (Tea Lady). Harsh Shashwat (Digital Partner). Omprakash Shrivastava (Overcharging Auto Guy). Priti Shukla (Receptionist). Mohammad Asif Siddiqui (Auto Guy- Vedika Tripathi). Abhishek Singh (Yadav). Tejashree Singh (Kanupriya). Zonty Stephen (Auto Guy. Kusum Tyagi). Kapil Tilhari (Salesman – Square Mall). Jayshankar Tripathi (Sharma Ji (as Jayashankar Tripathi)). Umakant Uma (Cab Driver Vedika Tripathi). Rajesh Dubey (Pandit (uncredited))

Languages Hindi

Producers Juno Chopra. Renu Chopra. Arun Singh Dikky. Hetvi Karia. Bhushan Kumar. Krishan Kumar. Ajay Rai. Rahul Rawat. Sandeep Sharma. Yogiraj Shetty

Production T-Series Film. T-Series
